title: Update CLAUDE.md with new navigation
description: Update CLAUDE.md to add navigation rules for ATEF components: when to reference validation gates, how to use pattern library, checkpoint system usage, error catalog integration. Update components list and add data-analytics template to navigation rules.
notes: CLAUDE.md navigation updated. Added ATEF component navigation rules: validation gates (referenced from complete-task workflow), pattern library (find-pattern/apply-pattern commands), checkpoint system (create-checkpoint/rollback-to/list-checkpoints/diff-checkpoint commands), error catalog (log-error/suggest-prevention commands). Data-analytics template added to template navigation. Tool routing section updated with ATEF integration points.
